mapResetter.toolTip: Reset the map to default state

dialog.text: All map layers will be turned off. The quick select pre defined layers will be activated instead.

presetLinks.error: The map-link contains errors. Reach out to the system administrator.
presetLinks.title: Quick select

themeToggler.title: Toggle between dark and light theme

controls.intro: At the far right on the screen there are some controls that are used to navigate the map.
controls.title: Map controls

searchBar.intro:
Here's the search bar.

The search tool can help you find what you're looking for.

moreOptions.intro: This button will show you more search tools.
moreOptions.title: More search tools

searchBar.title: Search bar

toolPanel.intro: This button will open the tool panel.
toolPanel.title: Tool panel

welcome.intro:
Here's a short guided tour showing you around the application!

Follow along!
welcome.title: Welcome to Hajk! ðŸ‘‹

widget.intro:
This is a widget button. Clicking it will open its corresponding tool.

Thats it! We hope that you'll like Hajk!
widget.title: Widget button

window.intro: Every tool draws their own window. You can move and resize the window to your liking.
window.title: Window

navigation.helpText: Tip: You can scroll trough the results using the arrow keys on your keyboard.

searchBar.srText: Search the content of the website

datasetSummary.maxWarning: Maximum number of search hits has been reached. Refine your search to ensure that important information is not missed.

featureDetails.showNext: Show the next object from the results list
featureDetails.showPrevious: Show the previous object from the results list

sort.toolTip: Sort the results, currently sorting after

limitSources.title: Limit sources
limitSources.toolTip: Enable to select which sources the search will be performed in. If the toggle is in it's off position, the search will be performed in all available sources.

useVisibleSources.title: Search in visible layers
useVisibleSources.toolTip: If active, searching will only be perfomed in visible layers.

mapLabels.title: Show feature labels
mapLabels.toolTip: If active, a label will be shown in the map next to the highlighted search result.

activeFilter.title: Demand that the whole feature must fit in the search area.
activeFilter.toolTip: If active, the whole feature (for example an estate polygon) must fit within the search area to be shown in the search results. If inactive, only a small part of the polygon must be in the search area to be shown in the search results.

matchCase.title: Case sensitivity
matchCase.toolTip: If active, a search for 'a' won't match features containing 'A'. Disable to search regardless of lowercase / uppercase.

wildcardAtEnd.title: Wildcard after
wildcardAtEnd.toolTip: If active, a search for 'road' will also return hits on 'road block'.

wildcardAtStart.title: Wildcard before
wildcardAtStart.toolTip: If active, a search for 'road' will also return hits on 'big road'.

extentSearch.title: View search
extentSearch.toolTip: Perform a search throughout the current map area.

objectSearch.snackBarText: Select an object in the map where you want to perform a search. Hold down CTRL to select multiple objects.
objectSearch.title: Object search
objectSearch.toolTip: Perform a search by selecting one or more areas in the map.

polygonSearch.snackBarText: Tap the map once for each node in the polygon. Perform the search by pressing the last node again.
polygonSearch.title: Polygon search
polygonSearch.toolTip: Perform a search in an area by drawing a polygon.

radiusSearch.snackBarText: Tap the map to place a center point, then drag outwards and release.
radiusSearch.title: Radius search
radiusSearch.toolTip: Perform a search in an area by drawing a circle.

dragAndDrop.onDragEnter: Drop a KML file to import it!
dragAndDrop.onDropError: The KML file could not be imported.

kml.error: No objects were found in the KML file.

layerComparer.closeCompareMode: Close the compare mode by pushing the button
layerComparer.title: Layer Comparer

layerSwitcher.description: Choose what to show in the map
layerSwitcher.title: Layer Manager

activeLayers.nothingToRestore: Please save some layers before restoring.

print.description: Save the map as a PDF
print.title: Print
